name: Marble Side Table, Black
description: The Marble Side Table, Black features a solid black marble base with a black-stained wood top. Showcasing a minimalist silhouette, the side table strikes a delicate balance between the richness of natural materials and contemporary design. The foundation of the piece is the solid black marble base, characterised by intricate subtle white veining. The marble is expertly sculpted into a modern cylinder. The slender pole and circular tabletop are crafted from FSC-certified Ash Wood. The sustainable wood is stained in a deep black hue, harmonising with the dark aesthetic of the marble base. Timeless in its appeal, this black marble side table with a black-stained wood top is a statement design piece.
